pages.title: Curses
pages.text: Wearing $(key)curses$() can grant special resources or combat power, but also comes with drawbacks.$(br2)The $(key)Curse of Envy$() is the most important curse and is usually the first one you should craft. It gives you a chance to obtain $(bold)trait items$() when killing enemies. $(bold)Trait items$() are $(bold)important materials$() for crafting many advanced trinkets and enchanted books.

$(br)The $(key)Curse of Pride$() and $(key)Curse of Wrath$() are late-game $(key)curses$() that can multiply your combat power, but they can only be worn in the $(mechanic/difficulty_tier#nightmare)Nightmare difficulty tier$().
